hoteles.descripcion: Hotel Casino Internacional is located in Cúcuta, right in front of the Ventura shopping center. It offers an outdoor pool, sauna, gym, free Wi-Fi and a welcome cocktail. Rooms at Hotel Casino Internacional feature elegant décor and include air conditioning, flat-screen cable TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. A full buffet breakfast is served daily and Las Guacas Restaurant offers international dishes.
hoteles.servicios: 2 swimming pools, Airport transfer, Free WiFi, Free parking, Family rooms. Fitness center good, Bar

hoteles.descripcion: Located in Cucuta, 1.3 km from Cucuta Public Library, Hampton By Hilton Cucuta offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers concierge services and a tour desk. Facilities include a 24-hour front desk, airport shuttle service, business center and free Wi-Fi.
hoteles.servicios: Airport transfer, Free WiFi, Free parking, Fitness center, Family rooms

hoteles.descripcion: Offering a terrace, Hotel Don Luis is located in Ocaña. It has a 24-hour front desk, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available at an extra charge.
hoteles.servicios: Free WiFi, Family rooms, Room service

hoteles.descripcion: Located in Cúcuta, 1.2 km from Cúcuta Public Library, ibis Cucuta offers accommodation, a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. The property has a garden and is 3.1 km from Ecoparque Comfanorte. There is a 24-hour front desk, airport shuttle service, concierge service and free WiFi in all areas.

hoteles.descripcion: Located in Cúcuta, 700 metres from Cúcuta Public Library and 5 km from Comfanorte Ecopark, Bianco Hotel Boutique offers accommodation with a terrace and free private parking. hoteles.descripcion: Located in Cúcuta, 2.4 km from Cúcuta Public Library, Hotel Restaurante Zhena offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. hoteles.descripcion: Offering a shared lounge, Hotel Plaza Cúcuta Center is located in Cúcuta in the Norte de Santander department, 1.3 km from Cúcuta Public Library and 5 km from Comfanorte Ecopark. It also has a restaurant, room service and 24-hour reception, and free WiFi in all areas. The hotel has family rooms.

hoteles.descripcion: Rooms at Zaraya Hotel feature a flat-screen cable TV, air conditioning and a balcony. The private bathroom has a shower and free toiletries.

hoteles.descripcion: Situated in Cúcuta, 6 km from Cúcuta Public Library and 10 km from Ecoparque Comfanorte, Hotel Arrival offers accommodation with a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and free private parking. There is a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage.

hoteles.nombre: Holiday Inn Cúcuta, an IHG Hotel
hoteles.descripcion: Holiday Inn Cúcuta, an IHG Hotel is located across from the Ventura shopping center, 5 minutes from the popular Santander Park, and offers an outdoor pool and a restaurant. It is also close to San José de Cúcuta's town hall, the cathedral and the financial sector. Free Wi-Fi access is available.
